name: While Lanterns Watched
description:
For a better experience, we highly recommend downloading the exe! The web build may lag. If you encounter audio issues, press the back option or the left button on the keyboard to replay the previous line.

If the game errors, try using Firefox.

Shen Qingqiu and his shidi stop by at a Dragon Boat Festival after a long mission. Hey, Liu-shidi, this could almost be like a date, right? Haha. 

Wait a second —

Art: chapter56, komikly

Writing: dryingmangoes, f2

Music: Discfortune

Special thanks: okijoki
